text: Jjukira Sitane bwe yabalaga bye baali bakola nti birungi, (Sitane) n'abagamba nti tewali muntu yenna waakubawangula olwa leero, era nti mazima nze nja kubataasa, naye ate e bibinja byâ€™ombiriri bwe byasisinkana, Sitane neyeefuula, era naagamba nti, mazima nze siri nammwe, anti mazima nze ndaba bye mutalaba, era mazima nze ntya Katonda, nga bulijjo Katonda muyitirivu wa kubonereza
